infos.value: What's wrong? Are you sleepy?
That's your problem, not mine.
And besides, I thought you were helping me find Machérie.
I have no idea where she is.
"No need for trepidation. Leonis Castle might as well be my home." Isn't that what you said earlier?
You sweat the details overmuch. No doubt Lady Machérie would turn her nose up at you.
Are you sure you hail from Leonis?
Of course. Do you doubt me?
Then you know this castle well, right?
It might as well be my home.
Then I'll ask again... Where do you think Machérie is being held?
How many times must I say it? I have no idea where she is.
Not even an inkling!?
Oh, I have an inkling.
Where?
I don't want to say.
...Are you trying to start a fight or something?
No, are you? If so, I accept.
Why don't you want to say...?
Because it wouldn't look very good if my prediction is wrong.
I give up... Let's just keep moving.
Oh? Where are we looking this time?
Warrior or not, Machérie is the princess of Hourne.
Following that logic...I guess she's either in the princess's or the queen's royal chambers.
You have some wit about you, after all. But Leonis doesn't have a princess.
Hmm... The queen's room it is, then.
Nice work, Camillo. That's exactly what I was thinking!
...I can't count on you at all, can I?
What are you talking about? Let's get going!
...Hah... Now I don't want to...
